name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notion Dark Mode - PNG background color

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Background Color to enhance the visibility of the letters in the PNG image

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Background Color to enhance the visibility of the letters in the PNG image because dark letters in the transparent PNG image in Notion dark mode is nearly invisible.
